Method Detail

getDataStore

DataStore getDataStore(DataStoreName name)
                       throws DataStoreNotFoundException
Obtains the DataStore that corresponds with the required name. If this DataStoreProvider can not provide the required data store a DataStoreNotFoundException is throw. To avoid receiving this exception consider use isProviderDataStore(DataStoreName).

Parameters:
name - the DataStoreName identifying the required data store.
Returns:
the DataStore that corresponds with the required name.
Throws:
{@link - DataStoreNotFoundException} if the required data store is not found.
{@link - IllegalArgumentException} if the name is null.
DataStoreNotFoundException

isProviderDataStore

boolean isProviderDataStore(DataStoreName name)
Indicates if this DataStoreProvider can provide the required data store.

Parameters:
name - the DataStoreName identifying the required data store.
Returns:
true if this provider can provide the required data store, false otherwise.

registerDataStore

void registerDataStore(DataStoreName name,
                       DatasetRepositoryModel dataSetModel)
Parameters:
name -
dataSetModel -
